alert.note: Alert for McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 5:34PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Massac, central Pope, east central Johnson and north central McCracken Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Metropolis, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dixon Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 2. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 25 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
